publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3940 John Swinburne: Congratulations to Motherwell FC and the Maggie’s Centre—That the Parliament congratulates Motherwell FC on its proposed assistance to the new Maggie’s Centre at Wishaw General Hospital, which seeks to offer help to those with cancer; notes that all profits from the forthcoming game against Falkirk FC on 11 March 2006 will be donated to the centre, including revenues from the gates, catering and programmes, and further notes that this should give a tremendous boost to the centre. R
S2M-3940 Congratulations to Motherwell FC and the Maggie’s Centre (lodged on 8 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3940 John Swinburne: Congratulations to Motherwell FC and the Maggie’s Centre—That the Parliament congratulates Motherwell FC on its proposed assistance to the new Maggie’s Centre at Wishaw General Hospital, which seeks to offer help to those with cancer; notes that all profits from the forthcoming game against Falkirk FC on 11 March 2006 will be donated to the centre, including revenues from the gates, catering and programmes, and further notes that this should give a tremendous boost to the centre. R Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-3940 Congratulations to Motherwell FC and the Maggie’s Centre (lodged on 8 February 2006) Brian Adam*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-3940 Congratulations to Motherwell FC and the Maggie’s Centre (lodged on 8 February 2006) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3940 Congratulations to Motherwell FC and the Maggie’s Centre (lodged on 8 February 2006) Dennis Canavan*
